title: New York City Companies Need More Cybersecurity Workers, Survey Finds
text:
New York City companies plan to increase hiring of tech talent next year, especially workers with cybersecurity expertise, a survey of executives found.

Eighty-five percent of respondents said they intend to increase tech hiring in 2020, with more than half planning to boost their tech hires by 20% or more compared with this year. Executives expressed confidence in New York City’s talent pool, with 87% saying they are confident they will be able to find employees with the tech skills their companies need.
